lead_paragraph: Bank stocks like JPMorgan Chase were also trading higher as interest rates rose further, but technology companies lost ground.

headline.print_headline: Tech Sinks, but Banks and Oil Lift Dow to a Record
headline.main: Wall St. Closes Mixed as Oil Prices Keep Rising

snippet: Bank stocks like JPMorgan Chase were also trading higher as interest rates rose further, but technology companies lost ground....
abstract: Rise in blue-chip banking and oil stocks lifts Dow Jones industrial average to record high despite hefty losses for technology and high-dividend stocks.
